item.content:encoded:
Triangle

When: May 11 at 10:30 am or 3:30 pm
Where: Waller Family Farm
5030 Kerley Rd, Durham, North Carolina 27705
Contact: Aishia Crayton, secretary@ncpan.org

http://www.wallerfamilyfarm.com/Site/Welcome.html
Come and pick strawberries with nannies and our charges!

Learn more about our previous Strawberry Picking @ http://www.ncpan.org/socializing/category/strawberry-picking

Open to NC PAN members, nannies who are not yet members of NC PAN, Friends of NC PAN, friends, moms, dads, etc.

RSVPs are MANDATORY. Email Aishia Crayton at secretary@ncpan.org

In a Different Region?

Volunteer as host for your region’s strawberry picking whenever your area has ripe berries to pluck! If you build it, they will come! Contact the NC PAN social chair via social@ncpan.org to get started. We will promote your event, add it to this post, help you gather RSVPs, and help you connect with nannies in your area.

All social events are volunteer hosted by member nannies!

Spread the Word!

Share this image to your favorite social media outlet, and add the details of your local region’s event!
